verses.verse: וַֽיִּגְּשׁ֗וּ <WH5066> vai-yig-ge-Shu, Then came near רָאשֵׁי֙ <WH7218> ra-Shei the heads אֲב֣וֹת <WH1> a-Vot of the fathers הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim, of the Levites אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about אֶלְעָזָר֙ <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar unto Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen, the priest וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' and unto Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> bin- the son נ֑וּן <WH5126> Nun; of Nun וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to רָאשֵׁ֛י <WH7218> ra-Shei and unto the heads אֲב֥וֹת <WH1> a-Vot of the fathers הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <WH4294> ham-mat-Tot of the tribes לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיְדַבְּר֨וּ <WH1696> vay-dab-be-Ru And they spake אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem to בְּשִׁלֹ֗ה <WH7887> be-shi-Loh, unto them at Shiloh בְּאֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנַ֙עַן֙ <WH3667> ke-Na-'an of Canaan לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded בְיַד־ <WH3027> ve-yad- by the hand מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, of Moses לָֽתֶת־ <WH5414> la-tet- to give לָ֥נוּ La-nu עָרִ֖ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim us cities לָשָׁ֑בֶת <WH3427> la-Sha-vet; to dwell in וּמִגְרְשֵׁיהֶ֖ן <WH4054> u-mig-re-shei-Hen with the suburbs לִבְהֶמְתֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH929> liv-hem-Te-nu. thereof for our cattle

וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nu gave בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לַלְוִיִּ֛ם <WH3881> lal-vi-Yim unto the Levites מִנַּחֲלָתָ֖ם <WH5159> min-na-cha-la-Tam out of their inheritance אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- according פִּ֣י <WH6310> pi at the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הֶעָרִ֥ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim these cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh these וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרְשֵׁיהֶֽן׃ <WH4054> mig-re-shei-Hen. and their suburbs

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze came out הַגּוֹרָ֖ל <WH1486> hag-go-Ral And the lot לְמִשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <WH4940> le-mish-pe-Chot for the families הַקְּהָתִ֑י <WH6956> hak-ke-ha-Ti; of the Kohathites וַיְהִ֡י <WH1961> vay-Hi received לִבְנֵי֩ <WH1121> liv-Nei and the children אַהֲרֹ֨ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen the priest מִן־ <WH4480> min- were of הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim, [which were] of the Levites מִמַּטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> mi-mat-Teh out of the tribe יְ֠הוּדָה <WH3063> Ye-hu-dah of Judah וּמִמַּטֵּ֨ה <WH4294> u-mi-mat-Teh and out of the tribe הַשִּׁמְעֹנִ֜י <WH8099> hash-shim-'o-Ni of Simeon וּמִמַּטֵּ֤ה <WH4294> u-mi-mat-Teh and out of the tribe בִנְיָמִן֙ <WH1144> vin-ya-Min of Benjamin בַּגּוֹרָ֔ל <WH1486> bag-go-Ral, had by lot עָרִ֖ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim cities שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> she-Losh three עֶשְׂרֵֽה׃ <WH6240> 'es-Reh. ten ס sa-Mek

וְלִבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> ve-liv-Nei of the children קְהָ֜ת <WH6955> ke-Hat of Kohath הַנּוֹתָרִ֗ים <WH3498> han-no-ta-Rim, And the rest מִמִּשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <WH4940> mi-mish-pe-Chot out of the families מַטֵּֽה־ <WH4294> mat-teh- of the tribe אֶ֠פְרַיִם <WH669> 'Ef-ra-yim of Ephraim וּֽמִמַּטֵּה־ <WH4294> u-mi-mat-teh- and out of the tribe דָ֞ן <WH1835> dan of Dan וּמֵחֲצִ֨י <WH2677> u-me-cha-Tzi and out of the half מַטֵּ֧ה <WH4294> mat-Teh tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֛ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh בַּגּוֹרָ֖ל <WH1486> bag-go-Ral [had] by lot עָרִ֥ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim cities עָֽשֶׂר׃ <WH6235> 'A-ser. ten ס sa-Mek

וְלִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> ve-liv-Nei And the children גֵרְשׁ֗וֹן <WH1648> ge-re-Shon, of Gershon מִמִּשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <WH4940> mi-mish-pe-Chot out of the families מַטֵּֽה־ <WH4294> mat-teh- of the tribe יִשָּׂשכָ֣ר <WH3485> yis-so-sh-Char of Issachar וּמִמַּטֵּֽה־ <WH4294> u-mi-mat-teh- and out of the tribe אָ֠שֵׁר <WH836> 'a-Sher of Asher וּמִמַּטֵּ֨ה <WH4294> u-mi-mat-Teh and out of the tribe נַפְתָּלִ֜י <WH5321> naf-ta-Li of Naphtali וּ֠מֵחֲצִי <WH2677> U-me-cha-tzi and out of the half מַטֵּ֨ה <WH4294> mat-Teh tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֤ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh בַבָּשָׁן֙ <WH1316> vab-ba-Shan in Bashan בַּגּוֹרָ֔ל <WH1486> bag-go-Ral, [had] by lot עָרִ֖ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim cities שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> she-Losh three עֶשְׂרֵֽה׃ <WH6240> 'es-Reh. ten ס sa-Mek

לִבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> liv-Nei The children מְרָרִ֜י <WH4847> me-ra-Ri of Merari לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֗ם <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam, by their families מִמַּטֵּ֨ה <WH4294> mi-mat-Teh [had] out of the tribe רְאוּבֵ֤ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven of Reuben וּמִמַּטֵּה־ <WH4294> u-mi-mat-teh- and out of the tribe גָד֙ <WH1410> gad of Gad וּמִמַּטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> u-mi-mat-Teh and out of the tribe זְבוּלֻ֔ן <WH2074> ze-vu-Lun, of Zebulun עָרִ֖ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim cities שְׁתֵּ֥ים <WH8147> she-Teim both עֶשְׂרֵֽה׃ <WH6240> 'es-Reh. ten

וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nu gave בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- And the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> lal-vi-Yim, unto the Levites אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הֶעָרִ֥ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim these cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh these וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרְשֵׁיהֶ֑ן <WH4054> mig-re-shei-Hen; with their suburbs כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֧ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- by the hand מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh of Moses בַּגּוֹרָֽל׃ <WH1486> bag-go-Ral. by lot פ Peh

וַֽיִּתְּנ֗וּ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nu, And they gave מִמַּטֵּה֙ <WH4294> mi-mat-Teh out of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וּמִמַּטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> u-mi-mat-Teh and out of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children שִׁמְע֑וֹן <WH8095> shim-'on; of Simeon אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et הֶֽעָרִ֣ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim these cities הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh, these אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יִקְרָ֥א <WH7121> yik-Ra which are [here] mentioned אֶתְהֶ֖ן <WH853> 'et-Hen בְּשֵֽׁם׃ <WH8034> be-Shem. by name

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi were for לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei Which the children אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, of Aaron מִמִּשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <WH4940> mi-mish-pe-Chot [being] of the families הַקְּהָתִ֖י <WH6956> hak-ke-ha-Ti of the Kohathites מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> mib-be-Nei [who were] of the children לֵוִ֑י <WH3878> le-Vi; of Levi כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for לָהֶ֛ם <WH1992> la-Hem was theirs הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-Yah become הַגּוֹרָ֖ל <WH1486> hag-go-Ral lot רִיאשֹׁנָֽה׃ <WH7223> ri-sho-Nah. first

וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nu And they gave לָהֶ֜ם <WH1992> la-Hem like אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קִרְיַת֩ kir-Yat אַרְבַּ֨ע <WH7153> 'ar-Ba' Kiriath-arba אֲבִ֧י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father הָֽעֲנ֛וֹק <WH6061> ha-'a-Nok of Anak הִ֥יא <WH1931> hi which חֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> chev-Ron which [city is] Hebron בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> be-Har in the hill יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah; [country] of Judah וְאֶת־ <WH854> ve-'Et for מִגְרָשֶׁ֖הָ <WH4054> mig-ra-She-ha with the suburbs סְבִיבֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5439> se-vi-vo-Tei-ha. thereof round about

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שְׂדֵ֥ה <WH7704> se-Deh But the fields הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir of the city וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et חֲצֵרֶ֑יהָ <WH2691> cha-tze-Rei-ha; and the villages נָֽתְנ֛וּ <WH5414> na-te-Nu thereof gave לְכָלֵ֥ב <WH3612> le-cha-Lev they to Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְפֻנֶּ֖ה <WH3312> ye-fun-Neh of Jephunneh בַּאֲחֻזָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH272> ba-'a-chuz-za-To. for his possession ס sa-Mek

וְלִבְנֵ֣י׀ <WH1121> ve-liv-Nei to the children אַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen, the priest נָֽתְנוּ֙ <WH5414> na-te-Nu Thus they gave אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עִיר֙ <WH5892> 'ir [to be] a city מִקְלַ֣ט <WH4733> mik-Lat of refuge הָרֹצֵ֔חַ <WH7523> ha-ro-Tze-ach, for the slayer אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> chev-Ron Hebron וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרָשֶׁ֑הָ <WH4054> mig-ra-She-ha; with her suburbs וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et לִבְנָ֖ה <WH3841> liv-Nah and Libnah וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרָשֶֽׁהָ׃ <WH4054> mig-ra-She-ha. with her suburbs

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et יַתִּר֙ <WH3492> yat-Tir And Jattir וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרָשֶׁ֔הָ <WH4054> mig-ra-She-ha, with her suburbs וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֶשְׁתְּמֹ֖עַ <WH851> 'esh-te-Mo-a' and Eshtemoa וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרָשֶֽׁהָ׃ <WH4054> mig-ra-She-ha. with her suburbs

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et חֹלֹן֙ <WH2473> cho-Lon And Holon וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרָשֶׁ֔הָ <WH4054> mig-ra-She-ha, with her suburbs וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et דְּבִ֖ר <WH1688> de-Vir and Debir וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרָשֶֽׁהָ׃ <WH4054> mig-ra-She-ha. with her suburbs

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עַ֣יִן <WH5871> 'A-yin And Ain וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרָשֶׁ֗הָ <WH4054> mig-ra-She-ha, with her suburbs וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et יֻטָּה֙ <WH3194> yut-Tah and Juttah וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרָשֶׁ֔הָ <WH4054> mig-ra-She-ha, with her suburbs אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֵּ֥ית beit שֶׁ֖מֶשׁ <WH1053> She-mesh [and] Bethshemesh וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרָשֶׁ֑הָ <WH4054> mig-ra-She-ha; with her suburbs עָרִ֣ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim cities תֵּ֔שַׁע <WH8672> Te-sha', nine מֵאֵ֕ת <WH853> me-'Et שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> she-Nei out of those two הַשְּׁבָטִ֖ים <WH7626> hash-she-va-Tim tribes הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> ha-'El-leh. these פ Peh

וּמִמַּטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> u-mi-mat-Teh And out of the tribe בִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> vin-ya-Min, of Benjamin אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- גִּבְע֖וֹן <WH1391> giv-'on Gibeon וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרָשֶׁ֑הָ <WH4054> mig-ra-She-ha; with her suburbs אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- גֶּ֖בַע <WH1387> Ge-va' Geba וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרָשֶֽׁהָ׃ <WH4054> mig-ra-She-ha. with her suburbs

אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֲנָתוֹת֙ <WH6068> 'a-na-tOt Anathoth וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרָשֶׁ֔הָ <WH4054> mig-ra-She-ha, with her suburbs וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עַלְמ֖וֹן <WH5960> al-Mon and Almon וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרָשֶׁ֑הָ <WH4054> mig-ra-She-ha; with her suburbs עָרִ֖ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim cities אַרְבַּֽע׃ <WH702> 'ar-Ba'. four

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> 'a-Rei All the cities בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron הַכֹּֽהֲנִ֑ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim; the priests שְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> she-losh- three עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh ten עָרִ֖ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim cities וּמִגְרְשֵׁיהֶֽן׃ <WH4054> u-mig-re-shei-Hen. with their suburbs ס sa-Mek

וּלְמִשְׁפְּח֤וֹת <WH4940> u-le-mish-pe-Chot And the families בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children קְהָת֙ <WH6955> ke-Hat of Kohath הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim, the Levites הַנּוֹתָרִ֖ים <WH3498> han-no-ta-Rim which remained מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> mib-be-Nei of the children קְהָ֑ת <WH6955> ke-Hat; of Kohath וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi Then עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> 'a-Rei even they had the cities גֽוֹרָלָ֔ם <WH1486> go-ra-Lam, of their lot מִמַּטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> mi-mat-Teh out of the tribe אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim. of Ephraim

וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nu For they gave לָהֶ֜ם la-Hem אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עִ֨יר <WH5892> 'ir [to be] a city מִקְלַ֧ט <WH4733> mik-Lat of refuge הָרֹצֵ֛חַ <WH7523> ha-ro-Tze-ach for the slayer אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁכֶ֥ם <WH7927> she-Chem them Shechem וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרָשֶׁ֖הָ <WH4054> mig-ra-She-ha with her suburbs בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> be-Har in mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim; Ephraim וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et גֶּ֖זֶר <WH1507> Ge-zer and Gezer וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרָשֶֽׁהָ׃ <WH4054> mig-ra-She-ha. with her suburbs
